title: Edinburgh,
author: Masson, Rosaline Orme.
snippet: winter, and to have taken up their residence in the Moray Place Gardens and the Dean Gardens, on either side of the Water of Leith, and in the beautiful Botanic Gardens and Arborituum ; and from these comfortable surroundings they called to one another eerie remarks across the valley, and vied with the fog signals from the Forth, which also generally " start to hoot " about nine o'clock.

title: Edinburgh,
author: Masson, Rosaline Orme.
snippet: What battles of the future, one wonders, are they to be that are now being fought in the flowery glades of the Dean Gardens ?
